text: Baishnab Charan Parida (15 February 1941 â€“ 22 November 2018) was a BJD politician, writer and social activist. He was a Member of Rajya Sabha (the upper house of India's Parliament) and represented Odisha. He was a Socialist. . orissadiary. com (2010-10-12). Retrieved on 2012-04-13. Parida was born in Jajpur, Odisha. Parida died on 22 November 2018 from liver cancer in Bhubaneshwar, India at the age of 77. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Politicians from Odisha Category:Indian writers Category:Members of the Rajya Sabha
title: Baishnab Charan Parida
